code: var API="https://safe-fjord-18355.herokuapp.com/";var teamMembersAPI=API+"team_members/";var addTeamToMember=function addTeamToMember(collaboratorID,team){return{type:"ADD_TEAM_TO_COLLABORATOR",collaboratorID:collaboratorID,team:team};};var addMemberToTeam=function addMemberToTeam(teamID,collaborator){return{type:"ADD_COLLABORATOR_TO_TEAM",teamID:teamID,collaborator:collaborator};};export var createTeamMember=function createTeamMember(collaborator,team){return function(dispatch){var body={team_id:"".concat(team.id),collaborator_id:"".concat(collaborator.id)};return fetch(teamMembersAPI,{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json","Accept":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify(body)}).then(function(r){return r.json();}).then(function(teamMember){if(teamMember.error){alert(teamMember.error);}else{dispatch(addTeamToMember(teamMember.collaborator_id,team));dispatch(addMemberToTeam(teamMember.team_id,collaborator));}return teamMember;});};};
